title: Library Management System (LMS)
description: A full-stack web application replicating my college's library system, allowing students to register, search, borrow, and return books online, while administrators manage inventory, users, and overdue records.

title: TA Management System
description: A full-stack system that streamlines university TA workflows with role-based views for Applicants, Instructors, and the TA Committee.

title: Appointment Booking System
description: Scheduling platform with Spring Boot backend (JWT, layered architecture) and a React + Tailwind frontend.

title: EmotionSense AI
description: Multimodal deep learning app that detects emotions from audio + transcripts (Flask + Keras + Whisper).

title: WeatherApp
description: React + TypeScript app using OpenWeather API. Deployed to Render.

title: My Portfolio Site
description: Personal portfolio built with React, Tailwind, and modern UI patterns.
